prompt: <description>**Intermediate CAD Part 1: A Rectangular Prism** Begin by creating a new coordinate system. Set the Euler Angles to [-90.0, 0.0, -90.0] and the Translation Vector to [0.0, 0.0, 0.0]. Next, draw a 2D sketch on the X-Y plane. * Face 1: * Loop 1: * Line 1: Draw a line from the point [0.0, 0.0] to the point [0.75, 0.0]. * Line 2: Draw a line from the point [0.75, 0.0] to the point [0.75, 0.625]. * Line 3: Draw a line from the point [0.75, 0.625] to the point [0.0, 0.625]. * Line 4: Draw a line from the point [0.0, 0.625] to the point [0.0, 0.0]. Sketch the scaled version of the 2D sketch by a factor of 0.75. Transform the scaled 2D sketch into a 3D Sketch using the specified coordinate system. Extrude the 3D Sketch along the normal direction by a distance of 0.25 units to create the first intermediate CAD part. This will form a rectangular prism with dimensions of 0.75 x 0.625 x 0.25 units. **Intermediate CAD Part 2: Adding onto the Rectangular Prism** Create a new coordinate system derived from the previous one. Set the Euler Angles to [-90.0, 0.0, -90.0] and the Translation Vector to [0.25, 0.0, 0.0]. Draw a 2D sketch similar to the previous part's sketch, but translated in the X direction by 0.25 units. * Face 1: * Loop 1: * Line 1: Draw a line from the point [0.0, 0.0] to the point [0.75, 0.0]. * Line 2: Draw a line from the point [0.75, 0.0] to the point [0.75, 0.25]. * Line 3: Draw a line from the point [0.75, 0.25] to the point [0.0, 0.25]. * Line 4: Draw a line from the point [0.0, 0.25] to the point [0.0, 0.0]. Sketch the scaled version of the 2D sketch by a factor of 0.75. Transform the scaled 2D sketch into a 3D Sketch using the specified coordinate system. Extrude the 3D Sketch along the normal direction by a distance of 0.25 units to create the second intermediate CAD part. This will increase the height of the rectangular prism to 0.5 units and create a solid rectangular prism measuring 0.75 x 0.625 x 0.5 units. This two-part construction process results in a final 3D rectangular prism.</description>

The dimensions of this part are as follows: * Length: 0.75 units * Width: 0.75 units * Height: 0.3409 units To construct this part, follow these steps: **Step 1: Create a new coordinate system** Create a new coordinate system with the following properties: * Euler Angles: [0.0, 0.0, 0.0] * Translation Vector: [0.0, 0.0, 0.0] **Step 2: Draw the 2D sketch** Draw a 2D sketch on the X-Y plane of the newly created coordinate system. The resulting object should have the shape and dimensions described above.</description>
